page.title: 12Organised Leisure Activities
page.content: Deeside Leisure Centre is a family centre attempting to provide facilities for all ages and is used by many of the families surveyed. There are other sports halls linked with the secondary schools and community centres; and sports fields and play areas are available throughout the area. The Ice Rink at the DLC is polpular and serves a large catchment area.Here too are well organised activities( team games ) and opportunities for individual or paired activities,or even just quiet relaxation. A sample survey of 75 children using DLC gave as most popular- Ice Skating(24%) Badminton (12%),Squash(9%) & Gymnastics(9%). There are many organised Children and Youth clubs or groups within the area and individual children speak of the clubs they attend with enthusiasm.
